The Silver Peal Ringers

Who Are We?


The Silver Peal Ringers are a dedicated ensemble of church bellringers who journey across the country sharing the rich heritage of English change ringing. Blending tradition with showmanship, we bring to life the resonant music of handbells and tower bells in churches, festivals, and community events nationwide. With precision, teamwork, and a deep love for our craft, our group transforms each performance into a vibrant celebration of sound, history, and fellowship.

Founded in 1978 by a small circle of tower ringers from three neighbouring parishes, we began as a modest effort to rekindle interest in bellringing among younger generations. Our first performances were informal — community fêtes, church anniversaries, and charity fundraisers — but our warm camaraderie and crisp, musical ringing soon earned us invitations across the country.

As our reputation grew, so did our involvement in national commemorations. In 2018, The Silver Peal Ringers were honoured to take part in special peals and half-muffled ringing to mark the Centenary of the End of World War I, joining bell towers nationwide in paying tribute to the fallen. Two years later, in 2020, we again took to the road — where permitted — to help commemorate the 75th Anniversary of the End of World War II, offering uplifting performances that celebrated peace and remembered sacrifice.

Over the decades, we have visited hundreds of towers across the UK, forging friendships with local bands, supporting restoration projects, and helping keep alive methods that have echoed through English history for centuries. Today, The Silver Peal Ringers remain committed to their founding mission: to inspire, to teach, and to let the timeless art of bellringing resonate wherever our travels take us.

Our Services

Sharing the art and tradition of bellringing through performance, education, and community events.

Live Performances

Traditional and contemporary ringing performances for churches, festivals, and special occasions.

Community Events

Bringing people together through sound, heritage, and shared celebration in towns and villages.

Workshops & Education

Educational sessions introducing the history and techniques of English change ringing.

Commemorative Ringing

Special peals and half-muffled ringing for memorials, anniversaries, and national occasions.


Whether you are planning a historic commemoration, a community celebration, or simply wish to experience the timeless sound of English bellringing, The Silver Peal Ringers are delighted to tailor our services to your event.

Our Message

We are proud to share the heritage of English change ringing, bringing communities together through sound, history, and fellowship.
